verses.roman:
manuṣya nā dekhe--madhura gīta-mātra śune
govindādi sabe meli' kaila anumāne

synonyms: manuṣya—a man; nā dekhe—could not see; madhura—very sweet; gīta—singing; mātra—only; śune—one could hear; govinda-ādi sabe—all the devotees, headed by Govinda; meli'-coming together; kaila anumāne—guessed.
translation: No one could see him, but they could hear him singing in a sweet voice. Therefore all the devotees, headed by Govinda, made this guess.
